channel.title: First time my server is down help asap!
channel.description:
ok so this is what the run server says x64 bit run server
exeption in thread "main" java.lang.exeptioninInitialLizerError Caused by: java.lang.arrayIndexOutofboundsexeption: 17 at server.world.itemhandler.loaditemlist<itemhandler.java.33> at server.server.<clinit><server.java:61> could not find the main class: server.server. program will exit. press any button to continue...
Please Help my server status is 100% and i want to keep it that way please put every step i have to do to fix this probleme!

item.title: First time my server is down help asap!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“RougescapeT0S, post:11, topic:394673”]i am using the old files right now but its all wierd lie when i put on an ags it gibbles my person and its like i move around alot anf all the items are in the wepons slot but my coder can fix that today but please put for suggestions on how to fix this probleme if it ever happens again[/quote]Just always have a backup

Read full topic
item.source: First time my server is down help asap!

item.title: First time my server is down help asap!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:9, topic:394673”][quote author=Linseylove link=topic=491859.msg3596877#msg3596877 date=1305183427]
Mostly there isnt only a x64 bit run in the files,

There should be a normal Run and a x32,

You should try 1 of those, if it still doesnt work then,

PM me then ill send you a working Run.bat
[/quote]

Except it has nothing to do with that. The error is exactly as I posted.[/quote]^ this you modified something with incorrect tabs.

Read full topic

item.title: First time my server is down help asap!
item.dc:creator: @giveitup giveitup
item.description:
@giveitup wrote:

like i said. u could use the origional item.java file from your source you downloaded and use that as a temperary one until you get your current one fixed. then it won’t be down because your error is talking about loading from the item.java file so that would temperarily fix it until you switch it up with the fixed version of your new updated item.java list…

Read full topic

item.title: First time my server is down help asap!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“RougescapeT0S, post:1, topic:394673”]ok so this is what the run server says x64 bit run server

exeption in thread “main” java.lang.exeptioninInitialLizerError
Caused by: java.lang.arrayIndexOutofboundsexeption: 17
at server.world.itemhandler.loaditemlist<itemhandler.java.33>
at server.server.server.java:61
could not find the main class: server.server. program will exit.
press any button to continue…

Please Help my server status is 100% and i want to keep it that way please put every step i have to do to fix this probleme![/quote]

You probably edited the items.cfg file, and added an extra space/tab where it shouldn’t belong.

Read full topic
